tracks.text: Intro sequence. A brown haired boy with blue eyes looks at us between outstretched fingers.
A silver, blue, and yellow robot.
The boy stands in a green tank top, blue shorts, and brown boots.
Joysticks, consoles, and a Heads Up Display flash.
The boy stands in a field of grass, blowing in the wind. Our view turns up to see a city skyline, flanked by metal walls, curving up into the distance.
A space station with a large metal loop floats between planets.
Fire rages amid rubble. A boy with a long brown braid at puts his hands on his hips.
A boy with long bangs crosses his arms.
A lanky blond boy sits cross legged.
A muscular chinese boy poses.
The brown haired boy looks at us between outstretched fingers, drops his hand. The silver and blue robot stands in space, brandishing a sword and shield.
A black and green robot swipes. An orange and red robot fires a machine gun. Small, gray robots fall before the blue robot.
A girl in a scarf stands in snow. Behind her, a frosty city crumbles. She looks down and kneels, finding a teddy bear dusted with snow.
The red robot stands amongst crackling fire and smoke
The black and yellow robot brandishes a giant green laser scythe.
The red and blue robot holds a spear in a forest clearing, robot bits steaming around it.
A yellow robot arms sits in the sand as a white and yellow robot stands over.
Soldiers in green and red stand at attention.
An aristocratic man in a dress uniform, cape, and epaulette waves.
A soldier in a white mask sits in a pilot seat. A white robot flies through space, wielding a laser sword at the red and blue robot.
The white robot thrusts and fires. The red and blue robot falls back, then fires a giant canon.
5 robots stand in a city. Cut to black
Lights glow along the wing of a space station.
Explosions erupt towards the center of the station
A space shuttle takes off. Purple robots fire rifles.
They fire at the departing shuttle, and it explodes.
Robots enter a space station, brandishing massive rifles. People stand hands up against a wall. Gunfire in the streets.
Small objects emerge from a space station, and maneuver themselves around. 5 objects circle the Earth.
A blue and yellow robot with wings floats above Earth, flanked by beams of light
In a satellite, soldiers in green uniforms look at monitors.
Zechs, a blond man wearing a white mask and a red dress uniform, watches the screen.
The sun rises over the Earth. A fighter jet flies in lower orbit.
The jet's pilot is a brown haired boy with blue eyes.
A man in a suit sits with his eyes closed. Next to him, a girl looks out the window.
A light in the window
The jet drops into burning atmosphere.
The pilot presses buttons.
Relena looks at her father.
The jet glows red. The pilot presses buttons, and golden lines glow across the ship. The chassis shatters.
A humanoid robot emerges, spreading its wings, and flies away
A screen analyzes the robot. Next generation fighter. Radar absorbent materials. Variable geometry.
Zechs' ship fires on the robot. The robot banks away, dodging.
Again and again. The pilot looks to the side.
The carrier's tail opens.
A green robot with a rifle drops out of the carrier.
Zechs turns over and shoots up. The other robot dodges, and shoots past Zechs. Zechs tracks him and shoots near his left wing.
The pilot adjusts a slider. The top of his robot slides forward, and the wings fold up. Segments rotate.
The jet has transformed into a humanoid robot with wings, a shield, and a rifle.
2 Aries suits join Zechs. They give him a parachute.
Zechs deploys the parachute.
The Aries suits fire at the winged Mobile Suit. It spins around, trailing smoke.
It shimmers in the light.
The Aries continue to fire.
The winged Mobile Suit turns to face the Aries. It brandishes a rifle, which glows. A giant beam of light and blue electricity shoots forward.
The Aries are vaporized.
The Mobile Suit pilot laughs.
Zechs tosses aside his rifle and releases the parachute from his suit.
The pilot tracks Zechs.
The pilot shoots, but Zechs dodges and unsheaths a laser sword.
Zechs begins to swipe, but the pilot catches his arm.
Zechs opens the suit's hatch and leaps off the side with a parachute.
The Gundam and the Leo crash into the ocean.
The suits sink.
An airport.
Relena watches her father ride off in a car with the soldiers. She turns away.
She walks alone along a boardwalk as the sun sets over the sea.
She sees the pilot, washed up on the beach. She runs down steps to the shore.
She turns
In a theater, a man drops opera glasses and turns to a screen.
The screen turns off. In an ornate room, 15 officers sit at a long table under chandeliers. The man from the theatre approaches.
On the beach, Relena lifts the pilot's helmet.
The pilot stands, covering his face.
An ambulance stops by the stairs.
The pilot opens a panel on his suit and presses a red button.
The panel explodes, pushing him back.
The pilot round house kicks 3 men in white off the stairs.
He kicks a man out of the ambulance and gets in the drivers seat.
He drives off. Relena stares after him.
She holds a hand out.
She stands alone, watching the ambulance drive off, towards the sunset.

In a factory at night, at least 9 Leo mobile suits stand in various stages of construction. They are large, green humanoid robots, with a yellow panel at the face. A human stands the height of the yellow panel, while others stand in boom lifts.
An explosion.
In a flash, Leo suits are severed across the chest.
A Gundam Mobile Suit wielding a scythe stands amidst explosions.
The Gundam slices a pipe, which sparks.
Duo, a boy with a brown braid, pilots the scythe Gundam. Outside in daylight, Leo suits fire.
A red and orange Gundam Mobile Suit wields a machine gun.
The Gundam's chest opens, revealing 2 more machine guns, which fire.
Rockets fire from compartments in the Gundam's chest and legs.
In a desert
Leo and other Mobile Suits surround a black and yellow Gundam.
The Gundam flies forward.
It swings its hands. 2 Leos are cut in half and explode. The pilot is a blond boy.
Battleships billow smoke and sink.
A Gundam with an extendable claw hand stands on a ship. It shoots its hand towards the ship's bridge. Ships burn around it.
Fighter jets fly overhead. The Gundam shoots 2 beams of fire at them.
The jets explode, and the battleship sinks.
Zechs Ship
Photo of a Gundam on a battleship
A pink car pulls up to a massive, European-style mansion. Relena sits in the back seat. Teenagers mingle on a verandah.
Students sit in a lecture hall.
A nun enters with a boy.
Her face hardens'
He doesn't look at her.
She stares at him.
Girls crowd together around a corner.
Relena hands Heero an envelope
He tears it.
He stares at her.
The pieces fall to the ground.
She watches them blow away. She balls her hand into a fist and shakes.
He wipes a tear from her eye. She smiles. He whispers in her ear.
She stares forward, eyes wide, as Heero walks away.
Leaves blow.
She watches him walk away.
Text appears. To be continued.
Outro sequence.
